mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_t_updateview ( TABLEID, COLUMNID, TOCOLUMNID, BGTLVL ) VALUES ( #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tocolumnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgtlvl,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL,BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM dict_t_factor WHERE COLUMNID IN (SELECT FRMCOLID FROM dict_T_factor WHERE FRMTABID = #{fromTableID} AND TABLEID = #{tableID})
